summary: Adds Prehistoric creatures in Skyrim (Mount, Summonable Mounts, Companions, Summonable Followers, Eggs/Babies)
descriptionHtml:
[b]NO DLC needed[/b]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/0QAGdVb.gif[/img]


[size=5][color=#ff0000][b]MEGALANIAS[/b][/color][/size]


[b]With this mod you can browse Skyrim on the back of a giant Lizard followed by an army of his babies ...

Ask also to 2 Lizard Companions to follow you and carry your charges or obey your orders ![/b]


[i]Parcourez Bordeciel sur le dos d'un Lézard géant suivi d'une armée de ses bébés ...

Demandez à 2 compagnons Lézards de vous suivre et de transporter vos charges ou d'obéir à vos ordres ![/i]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/5k0Fx5e.gif[/img]


[b][color=#ff0000] MOUNTS (2)[/color][/b]


You have 1 mount, not very far of [u]the Western Watchtower (Whiterun)[/u] near my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77683] Creatures House [/url] ; and 1 summonable mount …


To have the SUMMONABLE Mount, you must buy the “Spell tome: Summon Megalania”, at [color=#00ff00][b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b][/color]/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the book, you have the spell (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Prehistoric Creature"

In order to buy the books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]

If problem with the mount you can try a fast travel


[b][color=#ff0000] COMPANIONS (2)[/color][/b] Near the mount not very far of [u]the Western Watchtower (Whiterun)[/u]


You can talk: Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss, with these lizards !

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel


[b][color=#ff0000] INCUBATED EGGS[/color][/b] (Army of Megalanias)


This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Megalanias with the fire of the forge, and quickly create an army of Megalanias (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these Megalanias eggs, simply bring any “ Megalania Egg ” (found with some Merchants in Whiterun: [color=#00ff00][i][b]Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare [/b][/i][/color]) to a forge and create the "Incubated Megalania Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Megalania. The Megalania follow you.

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

In order to find the eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game


->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]Du2a3nBSpzw[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-



[size=5][color=#ff0000][b]GORGONOPS[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012306491616616015494011.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/23//18012306491616616015494011.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000] SUMMONABLE MOUNT [/color][/b] and [b][color=#ff0000] SUMMONABLE FOLLOWER[/color][/b]

To have the SUMMONABLE Mount/Follower, you must buy the “Spell tome: Summon Giant/Spotted Gorgonops”, at [color=#00ff00][b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b][/color](Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude).




[size=5][color=#ff0000][b]MOROPUS[/b][/color] [/size]

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012306442316616015494005.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/23//18012306442316616015494005.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000] SUMMONABLE MOUNT[/color][/b]

You must buy the “Spell tome: Summon Moropus” at Farengar...




[size=5][color=#ff0000][b]DAWN HORSE[/b][/color] [/size] (Hyracotherium)

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012306460916616015494007.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/23//18012306460916616015494007.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000] SUMMONABLE FOLLOWER[/color][/b]

You must buy the “Spell tome: Summon Dawn Horse” at Farengar...




[size=5][color=#ff0000][b]GLYPTODON[/b][/color] [/size]

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18032410005216616015629295.jpg][img]http://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/03/24//18032410005216616015629295.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000] SUMMONABLE MOUNT[/color][/b]

You must buy the “Spell tome: Summon GLYPTODON” at Farengar...




[size=5][color=#ff0000][b]WOOLLY RHINOCEROS[/b][/color] [/size]

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18072708545716616015823999.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/07/27//18072708545716616015823999.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000] SUMMONABLE MOUNT[/color][/b]

You must buy the “Spell tome: Summon Woolly Rhino” at Farengar...




[size=5][color=#ff0000][b]ELASMOTHERIUM[/b][/color] [/size]

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18072708545716616015823998.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/07/27//18072708545716616015823998.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000] SUMMONABLE MOUNT[/color][/b]

You must buy the “Spell tome: Summon Elasmotherium” at Farengar...




[b][color=#ff0000] CREDITS[/color][/b]


Mihail Romanov for the Megalania in [url=https://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88368/?] Megalania- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - lizard- megafauna reptile) [/url]; for the Gorgonops in [url=https://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88772/?]Gorgonops - Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons -megafauna) [/url]; for the Glyptodon in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90277/] Giant Sloths and Glyptodons [/url]; for the Woolly Rhino and the Elasmotherium in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92734/]Woolly Rhinos- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- megafauna) [/url]; and for the Moropus and the Dawn Horse in [url=https://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88815/?] Moropus and Dawn Horses - Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - megafauna) [/url] (« Feel free to use my mod in your projects, no need to ask me for permission first »)

Yoshimuji-Jon for the new textures in [url=https://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88458/?] Mihail Megalania Yoshi edition [/url] (« I give permision to use my textures, no problem »)
